Name: Fer Martin
AboutMe:
Entrepreneur, CTO, Tech consultant

I'm an entrepreneur and technologist with over 20 years of experience obtained in Europe, Singapore, Japan and Hong Kong for organizations such as General Assembly, Citibank, EMC, Telefonica or NTT Research Labs.

Elected president of the Spanish Confederation of Junior Enterprises, he has participated in the creation and successful development of multiple start-up internet, mobile and e-commerce companies.

Awarded with several scholarships from the European Union and the Ministry of Industry of Japan, he holds a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration and Master's degrees in both Computer Science and Business Intelligence.

Currently Lead Instructor for General Assembly's Web Development Immersive program in Hong Kong.
